div.h4: Want to submit your data to the KUPKB?
div.p: Then we are more than happy to assist you in doing so!! We have developed a simple spreadsheet template for users to submit data to the KUPKB. We aim to capture a minimal amount of information about the experiment and the observations made. Where possible we use a controlled vocabulary with terms from the KUP ontology that enables advanced querying capabilities in the iKUP browser.

The template is distributed as an Microsft Excel spreadsheet and can be edited in either MS Excel or the open source tool OpenOffice. You can download a copy of the template from here. There are some instructions in the spreadsheet but you can also view an example from one of the KUPKB exepriements here. If you have any questions or would like assistanc in submitting your data please contact us via e-mail at support [at] kupkb.org.
